title: The Careful Massacre of the Bourgeoisie
featuredTitle: The Careful Massacre of the Bourgeoisie
description: Something’s not quite right at the Miranda Manor. Ashley and Aaron’s New Year’s Eve party takes an unexpected turn.
quote: Do you know who my father is?
altHero: the killer dressed in a tuxedo, wearing a mustached mask, and holding a sharp spike
alt1: two yuppie teens sit at a fancy table set for a party
alt2: the masked killer looks at the camera from above, making a “shush” finger gesture
alt3: the two teens at the table wearing party hats, covered in blood
alt4: a group of teens scream in terror
